events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred last night involving their vehicle and another on the highway.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description referencing vehicle collision and damages.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the auto accident claim and to guide the customer through the process.
The claim has been officially acknowledged, and the customer received confirmation with next steps outlined clearly.
Documentation including police report, photos of the vehicle damages, and the driver's license was requested for investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents on time, including accident photographs and official police documentation.
The insurance investigation team has begun reviewing submitted evidence and verifying details related to the collision.
Investigation concluded, confirming liability and validating damages as per the vehicle inspection report.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the cost of repairs and related expenses from the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt assistance they received.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer and the insurance company.
Payment for the approved claim was disbursed to the policyholderâ€™s account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after payment issuance and final customer confirmation.
